==Functional Requirements==
 * 1 Account Management:
  * 1.1 System shall provide a "Registration Module" 
   * 1.1.1  In order to register , users have to provide their names, emails and date of birth
   * 1.1.3 System shall provide password remainder . If a user forget his password he should enter his email address a new created password should be sent to user

 * 2 Profile Management:
  * 2.1 System shall provide  Profile Management .
  * 2.1.1 Users should be able to update their Picture, location, website and email addresses

 * 5 Game Creator
  * 5.1 System shall provide a game type creation module for Game Creators.
   * 5.1.1 Game Creators are assigned by System administrator.
   * 5.1.2 Game Creators shouldn't use system without training for a specific amount of time. (How a new game type created etc)

 * 7 Game Creation Module
  * 7.1 System shall provide a game Creation Module
  * 7.1.1 Game Creator shall design each step of a game type
  * 7.1.1.1 A game consists of several steps which designed by game creator 
  * 7.1.2 Each step consist of an input output and next step
  * 7.1.3 Game designer specify each steps input output and which is next step after completion of current step

 * 8 QR Code Generation Module
  * 8.1 System shall provide a wizard which creates QR Code with desired data and in desired sizes.

 * 9 Training module
  * 9.1 System shall provide a training module
  * 9.2 Game creator shall be trained by a system-supported video
  * 9.3 Game Creator shall prepare "screencasts" in order to show how they game types are played
